author: Special Correspondent
text:
Jewellers in the city who gathered at T. Nagar on Friday resorted to a novel form of protest while seeking the rollback of excise duty levied on gold jewellery.

Several jewellers, who were wearing T-shirts printed with messages seeking withdrawal of one per cent excise duty, removed them and raised slogans as part of the protest.

For the third day, jewellery shops in the city remained closed due to the ongoing strike by various associations.

ongoing strike
title: Jewellers continue stir
